problem: There are 494 people on the beach.  252 are wearing sunglasses, 128 are wearing bathing suits, and 268 are wearing a hat.  Everyone is wearing at least one of these items. 83 are wearing both bathing suits and sunglasses. 116 are wearing both bathing suits and a hat. 32 are wearing both sunglasses and a hat.  How many people are wearing all three items?
